verse.roman:
tṛtīya uttamo nāma
priyavrata-suto manuḥ
pavanaḥ sṛñjayo yajña-
hotrādyās tat-sutā nṛpa

synonyms: tṛtīyaḥ—the third; uttamaḥ—Uttama; nāma—named; priyavrata—of King Priyavrata; sutaḥ—the son; manuḥ—he became the Manu; pavanaḥ—Pavana; sṛñjayaḥ—Sṛñjaya; yajñahotra-ādyāḥ—Yajñahotra and others; tat-sutāḥ—the sons of Uttama; nṛpa—O King.
translation: O King, the third Manu, Uttama, was the son of King Priyavrata. Among the sons of this Manu were Pavana, Sṛñjaya and Yajñahotra.
